edu.frontrange.csc240.a5.data

Class Programs

  • Object
    • edu.frontrange.csc240.a5.data.Programs

  • public class Programs
extends Object
    Assembles a list of available Turtle programs, and, as needed, provides access to those programs.
    Version:
    2.0, 2016-08-22, CSC-240, Assignment 5, Exercise 7.21 (alternative)
    Author:
    Dr. Bruce K. Haddon, Instructor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Programs

        public Programs()
        Constructor.

        Initializes the list of found programs, and keeps an association between the title of the program, and the file containing the program.

    • Method Detail
